segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is disgusting with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, soaking the cabinets— what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in that filthy puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting splashed with dirty water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing around— germs from the floor on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jar after touching who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too— this is unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, making everything slippery and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, at risk of getting wet and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't save this messy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using looks damp already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that— probably crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR
